video.title: jQuery: get and set with http, text, val, and attr - Beau teaches JavaScript
video.description:
jQuery comes with a bunch of DOM related methods that make it easy to access and manipulate elements and attributes. In this video I talk about getting and setting content and attributes using http, text, attr, and val.

💻 Code: https://codepen.io/beaucarnes/pen/mMbYZZ

🐦 Beau Carnes on Twitter: https://twitter.com/carnesbeau

-
Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on technology: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

And subscribe for new programming videos every day: https://youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=freecodecamp
